org.jcouchdb.db
Class Database

java.lang.Object
  org.jcouchdb.db.Database

public class Database
extends java.lang.Object

Contains the main interface of working with a couchdb database

Author:
shelmberger

See Also:
JSONParser.addTypeHint(String, Class), JSONParser.setTypeHints(Map), JSONParser#setTypeMapper(org.jcouchdb.json.TokenInspector)

createDocument

public void createDocument(java.lang.Object doc)
Creates the given document and updates the document's id and revision properties. If the document has an id property, a named document will be created, else the id will be generated by the server. assigned.

Parameters:
doc - Document to create.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the document already had a revision set
UpdateConflictException - if there's an update conflict while updating the document

bulkCreateDocuments

public java.util.List<DocumentInfo> bulkCreateDocuments(java.util.List<?> documents)
Bulk creates the given list of documents.

Parameters:
documents -
Returns:

createOrUpdateDocument

public void createOrUpdateDocument(java.lang.Object doc)
Creates or updates given document and updates the document's id and revision properties. If the document has an id property, a named document will be created, else the id will be generated by the server. assigned.

Parameters:
doc - Document to create.
Throws:
UpdateConflictException - if there's an update conflict while updating the document

updateDocument

public void updateDocument(java.lang.Object doc)
Updates given document and updates the document's revision property.

Parameters:
doc - Document to create.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the document had no revision property
UpdateConflictException - if there's an update conflict while updating the document

public <T> ViewResult<T> queryAdHocView(java.lang.Class<T> cls,
                                        java.lang.String fn)
Executes the given map / reduce functions and convert the response to a view result of the given class.

Type Parameters:
T - type
Parameters:
cls - runtime type info
fn - map / reduce function as valid JSON string (e.g. { "map" : "function(doc) { emit(null,doc);" }
